terms_conditions: For 25% Money Back offer, one person can get up to BDT 1000 cumulative.
For 100% Money Back offer, one person can get full money back of a single transaction.
The winners of #iPayHere will be notified through messaging on facebook and posting on our page.
promotions.title: iPay WoW!

promotions.subtitle: The more you pay with iPay at different outlets, the better will be your chance of winning in this contest.
terms_conditions: 3 people will each get 25000 taka worth gift from #iPayHere campaign complying with requirements.
The winners will be notified through facebook message and by posting on our page.
3 people will be selected at random as winners on 15 May 2018.
Only 3 Rules! Make payment with iPay wallet at any iPay enabled outlet. Check in with a photo of the shop. Make it a public post. Hashtag #iPayHere
